channel.title: Mafia II
channel.description:
Played the demo on steam this afternoon! I thought it was excellent, loved the fighting, the driving took some getting used to though! Hopefully it'll come packed with a tip top story line!
What did you guys think of it? =]

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: Someonerandm
item.description:
Maxey:

https://www.vg247.com/2010/08/24/mafia-ii-reviews-come-in-isnt-sleeping-with-the-fishes/

Hmmm…

Why not just link here?

All the reviews I need, plus it has regular gamer’s reviews.

Read full topic

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
All PhysX does to the game is add a thousand more particles during firefights. Not worth the huge performance impact.

Read full topic

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
when you don’t have nvidia GPU, physX uses the CPU to do the calculations, so it’s due to quad cores sucking dick

Read full topic

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: Harry-UK
item.description:
I leave Physx off, with it I get about 22fps average, without it, 60 constantly with everything else maxed with:

Intel Core 2 Quad 2.4Ghz
ATI Radeon 4850 1GB
2GB RAM

Is the lag due to me not having a Geforce? (I had an 8800 GT a few months ago, until it blew itself up )

Great game, I’ll be sure to get it when it’s released on the 27th over here.

Read full topic

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
That makes me feel better, I get over 30FPS on high if I turn off the physx crap.

And I only have a 2Ghz Core 2 Duo superclocked to 2.98Ghz

Read full topic

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: CTID
item.description:
Medevilae:

PhysX isn’t worth it. The difference is negligible. I run it on medium.

Sure makes it look cooler, though. The explosions throw a lot more debris on with PhysX on.

I can only run it on medium on my i5-750, 8 GB RAM, and a 9800 GT that’s OC’d.

Read full topic

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Hypno-Toad:

Uhh, i have all of that 'cept I have a 128mb Radeon X1050… Can that work?

No, even a radeon X1600 wouldn’t be playable because it’s twice slower than the x1650, the requirements need a X1900 and the x1650 is only slightly slower than the x1900.

Also, pentium 4 sucks for games.

Read full topic

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Maxey:

https://www.vg247.com/2010/08/24/mafia-ii-reviews-come-in-isnt-sleeping-with-the-fishes/

Hmmm…

Haha. That list is an eye opener. Sure goes to show Eurogamer (or at least one branch of Eurogamer,) is full of shit.

@NeonImpulse, Overall I’m impressed thus far. I’m at about 30% completion, and I can say that it’s worth buying and better than any GTA I’ve played.

Comparing it to unrelated games, it’s about a Minecraft or a Fallout 3 on my goodness rating.

Read full topic

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
Psych:

So the reviews are in . . .

Yes this I know this isn’t the only review, but it sure is a joy to read.

https://www.eurogamer.net/articles/2010-08-23-mafia-ii-review

That guys a joke. He was looking for a GTA or Postal type of experience. I don’t often get to say this about “professional” raters, but this game is obviously 2deep4him. He’s LITERALLY complaining that it has a story. He also said “it masks its awfulness so well.”

I honestly doubt he played the game fast the first chapter, plus, he’s referencing all these invisible bugs and problems with the game, and says stuff like cops reacting is bad, and that there’s too many fistfights, it goes on and on. He’s a dunce to put it bluntly.

EDIT: Came to my senses. It’s EUROGAMER, the imitation meat.

Read full topic

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: Medevilae
item.description:
OldDirtyBastard:

Yeah like, the same happened in GTA: SA when an old lady slightly touched a police car in her 4-seater. Cops just got out, threw the old lady out of the car, discharged a few clips into her and drove away from the crime scene.

Haha I think the cops in Mafia2 were a bit fairer than those ones sound.

Also, never ever ever shoot someone in the factory town ghetto type place with the dirt roads. EVERY BLACK GUY HAS A GUN.

Read full topic

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
A bit late but,

Someonerandm:

Good new everyone! I’ve worked out why I think GTA IV looks better. The graphics are lower res, but everything is more detailed, with random junk everywhere and a generally larger number of detail props…

Read full topic

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: johnyo
item.description:
Just tried it. The game’s pretty awesome. The police is violent as hell, I hit a random guy on the street and they started shooting at me. They are very bad at car chasing though.

All in all it sucks because it runs at 20fps average. It may be optimised, but not for single-fucking-core CPUs.

Read full topic

item.title: Mafia II
item.dc:creator: OldDirtyBastard
item.description:
Medevilae:

The cops are cool, but racist as hell.

A taxi cab ran into my car so I turned and fired a few shots off at it with my 45. Two cops heard the gunfire from nearby, and drove over towards me. I decided to bribe them, and just stood there and waited for them. They didn’t go to me. They walked by me and arrested a black guy who hadn’t done anything. He cooperated for a bit, but he was faking them out. He took off, only to be shot in the back of the head by one of the cops.

Yeah like, the same happened in GTA: SA when an old lady slightly touched a police car in her 4-seater. Cops just got out, threw the old lady out of the car, discharged a few clips into her and drove away from the crime scene.

Read full topic
